data.title: Short Film Exchange
data.meta_site_name: Galway Film Fleadh - International Film Festival in the West of Ireland
data.text:
The Galway Film Fleadh, Galway Film Fair and The National Talent Academy for Film and TV are thrilled to offer live-action fiction Short Film Writers, Writer/Directors, and Producers an exclusive opportunity to connect through one-on-one meetings on Sunday July 14th at this year’s festival.

Format:

One-on-one meetings where writers can pitch their scripts to producers in a speed-dating format.

Each meeting will last 5 minutes from approx. 2.00 – 3.30PM

After the meetings, participants will have the chance to mingle and continue conversations in a more relaxed setting over private networking drinks from 3.30 – 4.00PM

We also warmly invite other short filmmakers to join us for this networking opportunity from 4:00 – 5:30 PM.

Schedule:

Meetings & Networking: 2:00 PM – 4.00PM

Wider Networking Drinks: 4:00 PM – 5:30 PM

Emerging and established Short Film Writers, Writer/Directors, and Producers can now apply to take part in the Short Film Exchange. With the application deadline on June 26th at noon.

For more details on this event, who can apply and how, please see www.nationaltalentacademies.ie/film-tv

For any questions, please email eibh@filmfleadh.ie and filmandtv@nationaltalentacademies.ie

The National Talent Academy for Film and TV is an initiative of Screen Ireland managed by Ardán.
